channel.title: Defense

item.title: The Pentagon's battle of the bands
item.description: Music in the military is a storied tradition, but some lawmakers say $437 million in yearly spending is too much.

item.title: House passes sweeping defense policy bill

item.title: How Elon Musk exposed billions in questionable Pentagon spending
item.description: Ten years after a joint operation of Boeing and Lockheed Martin was born, the FTC’s direst warnings have come true, along with outcomes even the skeptics did not predict.

item.title: The Democrats' secretary of war
item.description: President Obama's fourth defense secretary is looking a lot like he could be Hillary Clinton's first.
